data.name: CanBeIncreasedToAllowMoreUndosButWillConsumeMoreMemory
data.value: Can be increased to allow more undos, but will consume more memory.

data.name: AllSettingsWillBeResetToDefaultRestartingTheGameCouldBeNecessaryToFullyApply
data.value: All settings will be reset to default. Restarting the game could be necessary to fully apply.

data.name: ThisWillResetYourCampaignProgressionButWONTRemoveSolvedSolutions
data.value: This will reset your campaign progression, but WON'T remove solved solutions.

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToResetYourCampaignProgressionNSolvedSolutionsWonTBeRemoved
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset your campaign progression? Solved solutions won't be removed.

data.name: ThisWillResetEVERYSettingsSolutionsAndCampaignProgression
data.value: This will reset EVERY settings, solutions and campaign progression.

data.name: AreYouSureYouWantToResetEVERYSolutionsAndCampaignProgressionNTHISDELETEEVERYTHINGBESUREWHATYOUAREDOING
data.value:
Are you sure you want to reset EVERY solutions and campaign progression?
THIS DELETE EVERYTHING, BE SURE WHAT YOU ARE DOING!

data.name: MusicAndAmbianceLicencesAllowMonetizedContent
data.value: *Music and ambiance licences allow monetized content.

data.name: ChartsAreCalculatedWithTheLatestSolutionsFromNaroundTheWorldAndYourScoresUpdateCharts
data.value: Charts are calculated with the latest solutions from around the world and your scores update charts.

data.name: ChartsAreCalculatedFromAFixedAndLocalSnapshotNofTheLatestSolutionsFromAroundTheWorldYourNscoresDonTUpdateCharts
data.value: Charts are calculated from a fixed and local snapshot of the latest solutions from around the world. Your scores don't update charts.

data.name: UseCubicWhenNothingElseWorksWillRenderCubesInsteadOfComplexShapesFastButUgly
data.value: Use Cubic when nothing else works. Will render cubes instead of complex shapes, fast but ugly.

data.name: RayPrecisionIsTheNumberOfStepsEachRayPerformNHigherValuesWillIncreaseQualityButWillDecreasePerformance
data.value: Ray precision is the number of steps each ray perform. Higher values will increase quality, but will decrease performance.

data.name: NoPerformanceCostButMayCauseDiscomfortToSomeUsers
data.value: No performance cost, but may cause discomfort to some users.

data.name: WonTBeAppliedIfVSyncIsEnabled
data.value: Won't be applied if VSync is enabled.

data.name: LowerValuesWillIncreasePerformanceButWillDecreaseQualityNHigherValuesWillStronglyDecreasePerformanceButWillIncreaseQuality
data.value: Lower values will increase performance, but will decrease quality. Higher values will strongly decrease performance, but will increase quality.

data.name: FieldOfViewUsedDuringFirstPersonPhasesNoPerformanceCost
data.value: Field of view used during first-person phases. No performance cost.

data.name: FieldOfViewUsedDuringEditorPhasesNoPerformanceCost
data.value: Field of view used during editor phases. No performance cost.

data.name: FlipVerticalMouseMovementDuringFPSPhases
data.value: Flip vertical mouse movement during FPS phases.

data.name: IfEnabledDoubleLeftMouseClickWillSwitchToEditModeNOneSingleClickDoesSoftCancelEitherWay
data.value: If enabled, double right mouse click will switch to edit mode. Metal block will be automatically selected.

data.name: Action
data.comment: Describe what a key binding does

data.name: ReduceVisualStrainOnTheEditorSBackgroundForSensitivityToBrightness
data.value: May reduce visual strain from the editor's background for some users.

data.name: FPSInvertYAxis
data.value: Invert Y axis during first-person phases

data.name: MouseEdgeScrollingTooltip
data.value: Move the camera around when the mouse is on the edge of the screen.

data.name: MouseHorizontalScrollingTooltip
data.value: Rotate the camera on mouse horizontal scroll.

data.name: ThisAllowsYourSteamUsernameToAppearOnTheLeaderboardsReplacingTheCurrent
data.value:
This allows your Steam username to appear on the leaderboards, replacing the current autogenerated name.
By enabling this, you consent to Hard Chip using your Steam username for leaderboard display purposes.
